entry.title: $2125 // NO FEE Renovated ASTORIA 1Bed/1Bath in ASTORIA! MUST SEE!
entry.content:
NO FEE Renovated ASTORIA 1Bed/1Bath in ASTORIA! MUST SEE!

Listing ID #: 277449
Price: $2,125
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 1.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Pets: Cats Only

Laundry
Live In Super

Apartment Amenities

Dishwasher
Hardwood
Light
NO FEE
Renovated
Stainless Steel Appliances

Beautiful 1 Bed/1 Bath In the heart of Astoria with all the shopping, dining and nightlife! 1 block away from the Broadway & 30th Ave N/W train stations; placing you a quick, easy 15 minute train ride away from Manhattan. 2nd Floor walk-up. Apartment Features: -Separate Kitchen with dishwasher and microwave - Stainless Steel Appliances - Great Sunlight - Beautiful Hardwood floors - Plenty of Closet Space - Renovated bathroom - Heat And Hot Water Included - Live in Super - Laundry in Building

Call/text Ben Kim at 347-291-1761 to schedule a viewing! *Cats OK only *NO FEE on 12 month lease

Benjamin Kim
